problems.title: Last Index of X (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given an array of N integers and a value X, find the last index where X appears using recursion. If X is not present, print -1. Indexing is 0-based.

Input Format:
First line: integer N.
Second line: N integers.
Third line: integer X.

Output Format:
Print the last index of X or -1 if not found.
hintsList: Recurse to the end first: get last index in arr[1..n-1], if not found and arr[0]==x then 0, else adjust index by +1.
